ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/13/99 8:33:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... You can only spend 1 at 16, and then a few more at 20.  (though I was already 20 when research
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/13/99 8:33:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
lachdanan@... writes:

> Thank you for your help-greatly appreciated- one thing do I spend all the
> training points I can on research, or what is best/allowed?
>

You can only spend 1 at 16, and then a few more at 20. (though I was already
20 when research was implemented and was only able to spend 1 then... but
that got it to 20)

I would save most of your points for specialization, I spent 40 points in
specialization when it was implemented :)
